champions.blurb: An unhinged and impulsive criminal from the undercity, Jinx is haunted by the consequences of her past—but that doesn't stop her from bringing her own chaotic brand of pandemonium to Piltover and Zaun. She uses her arsenal of DIY weapons to devastating...

abilities.name: Switcheroo!
abilities.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower.

abilities.name: Zap!
abilities.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

abilities.name: Flame Chompers!
abilities.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

abilities.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
abilities.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

passive.name: Get Excited!
passive.description: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

champions.name: K'Sante
champions.title: the Pride of Nazumah
champions.blurb: Defiant and courageous, K'Sante battles colossal beasts and ruthless Ascended to protect his home of Nazumah, a coveted oasis amid the sands of Shurima. But after a falling-out with his former partner, K'Sante realizes that in order to become a warrior...

abilities.name: Ntofo Strikes
abilities.description: K'Sante strikes, damaging and slowing enemies in a short line.On hit, grants a stack of Ntofo Strikes. At 2 stacks, K'Sante fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in.When All Out, cooldown is reduced.

abilities.name: Path Maker
abilities.description: K'Sante charges up, taking reduced damage, then dashes, knocking back and stunning enemies.When All Out, deals increased damage and no longer knocks back or stuns.

abilities.name: Footwork
abilities.description: K'Sante dashes and gains a shield. If targeting an ally, K'Sante dashes to the ally with increased range and both gain a shield.When All Out, cooldown is reduced and speed is increased.

abilities.name: All Out
abilities.description: K'Sante knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, K'Sante goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.

passive.name: Dauntless Instinct
passive.description: K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack.When All Out, K'Sante deals more damage with all Attacks and Abilities.

champions.name: Kai'Sa
champions.title: Daughter of the Void
champions.blurb: Claimed by the Void when she was only a child, Kai'Sa managed to survive through sheer tenacity and strength of will. Her experiences have made her a deadly hunter and, to some, the harbinger of a future they would rather not live to see. Having entered...

abilities.name: Icathian Rain
abilities.description: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.

abilities.name: Void Seeker
abilities.description: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.

abilities.name: Supercharge
abilities.description: Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed.Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.

abilities.name: Killer Instinct
abilities.description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.

passive.name: Second Skin
passive.description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

champions.name: Kalista
champions.title: the Spear of Vengeance
champions.blurb: A specter of wrath and retribution, Kalista is the undying spirit of vengeance, an armored nightmare summoned from the Shadow Isles to hunt deceivers and traitors. The betrayed may cry out in blood to be avenged, but Kalista only answers those willing...

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description: Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
abilities.notes: Killing the soul gives cs

abilities.name: Rend
abilities.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

abilities.name: Fate's Call
abilities.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

passive.name: Martial Poise
passive.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

champions.name: Karma
champions.title: the Enlightened One
champions.blurb: No mortal exemplifies the spiritual traditions of Ionia more than Karma. She is the living embodiment of an ancient soul reincarnated countless times, carrying all her accumulated memories into each new life, and blessed with power that few can...

abilities.name: Inner Flame
abilities.description: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

abilities.name: Focused Resolve
abilities.description: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally.Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Mantra
abilities.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

passive.name: Gathering Fire
passive.description: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.

champions.name: Karthus
champions.title: the Deathsinger
champions.blurb: The harbinger of oblivion, Karthus is an undying spirit whose haunting songs are a prelude to the horror of his nightmarish appearance. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of...

abilities.name: Lay Waste
abilities.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.

abilities.name: Wall of Pain
abilities.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

abilities.name: Defile
abilities.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

abilities.name: Requiem
abilities.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

passive.name: Death Defied
passive.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

champions.name: Kassadin
champions.title: the Void Walker
champions.blurb: Cutting a burning swath through the darkest places of the world, Kassadin knows his days are numbered. A widely traveled Shuriman guide and adventurer, he had chosen to raise a family among the peaceful southern tribes—until the day his village was...

abilities.name: Null Sphere
abilities.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

abilities.name: Nether Blade
abilities.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

abilities.name: Force Pulse
abilities.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

abilities.name: Riftwalk
abilities.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

passive.name: Void Stone
passive.description: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

champions.name: Katarina
champions.title: the Sinister Blade
champions.blurb: Decisive in judgment and lethal in combat, Katarina is a Noxian assassin of the highest caliber. Eldest daughter to the legendary General Du Couteau, she made her talents known with swift kills against unsuspecting enemies. Her fiery ambition has driven...

abilities.name: Bouncing Blade
abilities.description: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

abilities.name: Preparation
abilities.description: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.

abilities.name: Shunpo
abilities.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

abilities.name: Death Lotus
abilities.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

passive.name: Voracity
passive.description: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced.If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

champions.name: Kayle
champions.title: the Righteous
champions.blurb: Born to a Targonian Aspect at the height of the Rune Wars, Kayle honored her mother's legacy by fighting for justice on wings of divine flame. She and her twin sister Morgana were the protectors of Demacia for many years—until Kayle became disillusioned...

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

abilities.name: Celestial Blessing
abilities.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants Move Speed to herself and the nearest ally.

abilities.name: Starfire Spellblade
abilities.description: Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.

abilities.name: Divine Judgment
abilities.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

passive.name: Divine Ascent
passive.description: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.

champions.name: Kayn
champions.title: the Shadow Reaper
champions.blurb: A peerless practitioner of lethal shadow magic, Shieda Kayn battles to achieve his true destiny—to one day lead the Order of Shadow into a new era of Ionian supremacy. He wields the sentient darkin weapon Rhaast, undeterred by its creeping corruption of...

abilities.name: Reaping Slash
abilities.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

abilities.name: Blade's Reach
abilities.description: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Kayn can walk through terrain.

abilities.name: Umbral Trespass
abilities.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

passive.name: The Darkin Scythe
passive.description: Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin.Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions.Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.

champions.name: Kennen
champions.title: the Heart of the Tempest
champions.blurb: More than just the lightning-quick enforcer of Ionian balance, Kennen is the only yordle member of the Kinkou. Despite his small, furry stature, he is eager to take on any threat with a whirling storm of shuriken and boundless enthusiasm. Alongside his...

abilities.name: Thundering Shuriken
abilities.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

abilities.name: Electrical Surge
abilities.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

abilities.name: Lightning Rush
abilities.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

abilities.name: Slicing Maelstrom
abilities.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

passive.name: Mark of the Storm
passive.description: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.

champions.name: Kha'Zix
champions.title: the Voidreaver
champions.blurb: The Void grows, and the Void adapts—in none of its myriad spawn are these truths more apparent than Kha'Zix. Evolution drives the core of this mutating horror, born to survive and to slay the strong. Where it struggles to do so, it grows new, more...

abilities.name: Taste Their Fear
abilities.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

abilities.name: Void Spike
abilities.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

abilities.name: Void Assault
abilities.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, Void Assault gains increased Invisibility duration, and an additional use.

passive.name: Unseen Threat
passive.description: Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets.When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.

champions.name: Kindred
champions.title: The Eternal Hunters
champions.blurb: Separate, but never parted, Kindred represents the twin essences of death. Lamb's bow offers a swift release from the mortal realm for those who accept their fate. Wolf hunts down those who run from their end, delivering violent finality within his...

abilities.name: Dance of Arrows
abilities.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

abilities.name: Wolf's Frenzy
abilities.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.  Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.

abilities.name: Mounting Dread
abilities.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

abilities.name: Lamb's Respite
abilities.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

passive.name: Mark of the Kindred
passive.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

champions.name: Kled
champions.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
champions.blurb: A warrior as fearless as he is ornery, the yordle Kled embodies the furious bravado of Noxus. He is an icon beloved by the empire's soldiers, distrusted by its officers, and loathed by the nobility. Many claim Kled has fought in every campaign the...

abilities.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
abilities.description: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

abilities.name: Violent Tendencies
abilities.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

abilities.name: Jousting
abilities.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

abilities.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
abilities.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

passive.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
passive.description: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

champions.name: Kog'Maw
champions.title: the Mouth of the Abyss
champions.blurb: Belched forth from a rotting Void incursion deep in the wastelands of Icathia, Kog'Maw is an inquisitive yet putrid creature with a caustic, gaping mouth. This particular Void-spawn needs to gnaw and drool on anything within reach to truly understand it...

abilities.name: Caustic Spittle
abilities.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

abilities.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
abilities.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

abilities.name: Void Ooze
abilities.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

abilities.name: Living Artillery
abilities.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

passive.name: Icathian Surprise
passive.description: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.

champions.name: LeBlanc
champions.title: the Deceiver
champions.blurb: Mysterious even to other members of the Black Rose cabal, LeBlanc is but one of many names for a pale woman who has manipulated people and events since the earliest days of Noxus. Using her magic to mirror herself, the sorceress can appear to anyone...

abilities.name: Sigil of Malice
abilities.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage. If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds the Mana cost and part of this spell's remaining Cooldown.

abilities.name: Distortion
abilities.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

abilities.name: Ethereal Chains
abilities.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.

abilities.name: Mimic
abilities.description: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

passive.name: Mirror Image
passive.description: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

champions.name: Lee Sin
champions.title: the Blind Monk
champions.blurb: A master of Ionia's ancient martial arts, Lee Sin is a principled fighter who channels the essence of the dragon spirit to face any challenge. Though he lost his sight many years ago, the warrior-monk has devoted his life to protecting his homeland...

abilities.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
abilities.description: Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

abilities.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
abilities.description: Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will.Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

abilities.name: Tempest / Cripple
abilities.description: Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple.Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

abilities.name: Dragon's Rage
abilities.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

passive.name: Flurry
passive.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

champions.name: Leona
champions.title: the Radiant Dawn
champions.blurb: Imbued with the fire of the sun, Leona is a holy warrior of the Solari who defends Mount Targon with her Zenith Blade and the Shield of Daybreak. Her skin shimmers with starfire while her eyes burn with the power of the celestial Aspect within her...

abilities.name: Shield of Daybreak
abilities.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

abilities.name: Zenith Blade
abilities.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.

passive.name: Sunlight
passive.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

champions.name: Lillia
champions.title: the Bashful Bloom
champions.blurb: Intensely shy, the fae fawn Lillia skittishly wanders Ionia's forests. Hiding just out of sight of mortals—whose mysterious natures have long captivated, but intimidated, her—Lillia hopes to discover why their dreams no longer reach the ancient Dreaming...

abilities.name: Blooming Blows
abilities.description: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

abilities.name: Watch Out! Eep!
abilities.description: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

abilities.name: Swirlseed
abilities.description: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.

abilities.name: Lilting Lullaby
abilities.description: Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up.

passive.name: Dream-Laden Bough
passive.description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

champions.name: Lissandra
champions.title: the Ice Witch
champions.blurb: Lissandra's magic twists the pure power of ice into something dark and terrible. With the force of her black ice, she does more than freeze—she impales and crushes those who oppose her. To the terrified denizens of the north, she is known only as ''The...

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

abilities.name: Glacial Path
abilities.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

abilities.name: Frozen Tomb
abilities.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed.

passive.name: Iceborn Subjugation
passive.description: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

champions.name: Lucian
champions.title: the Purifier
champions.blurb: Lucian, a Sentinel of Light, is a grim hunter of wraiths and specters, pursuing them relentlessly and annihilating them with his twin relic pistols. After the specter Thresh slew his wife, Lucian embarked on the path of vengeance—but even with her...

abilities.name: Piercing Light
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

abilities.name: Ardent Blaze
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Move Speed for attacking marked enemies.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

abilities.name: The Culling
abilities.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

passive.name: Lightslinger
passive.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot. When Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy Champion is immobilized, his next 2 basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage.

champions.name: Lulu
champions.title: the Fae Sorceress
champions.blurb: The yordle mage Lulu is known for conjuring dreamlike illusions and fanciful creatures as she roams Runeterra with her fairy companion Pix. Lulu shapes reality on a whim, warping the fabric of the world, and what she views as the constraints of this...

abilities.name: Glitterlance
abilities.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits.

abilities.name: Whimsy
abilities.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.

abilities.name: Help, Pix!
abilities.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

abilities.name: Wild Growth
abilities.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

passive.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
passive.description: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.

champions.name: Lux
champions.title: the Lady of Luminosity
champions.blurb: Luxanna Crownguard hails from Demacia, an insular realm where magical abilities are viewed with fear and suspicion. Able to bend light to her will, she grew up dreading discovery and exile, and was forced to keep her power secret, in order to preserve...

abilities.name: Light Binding
abilities.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

abilities.name: Prismatic Barrier
abilities.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

abilities.name: Lucent Singularity
abilities.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

abilities.name: Final Spark
abilities.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

passive.name: Illumination
passive.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

champions.name: Malphite
champions.title: Shard of the Monolith
champions.blurb: A massive creature of living stone, Malphite struggles to impose blessed order on a chaotic world. Birthed as a servitor-shard to an otherworldly obelisk known as the Monolith, he used his tremendous elemental strength to maintain and protect his...

abilities.name: Seismic Shard
abilities.description: Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Thunderclap
abilities.description: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

abilities.name: Ground Slam
abilities.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Force
abilities.description: Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

passive.name: Granite Shield
passive.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.

champions.name: Malzahar
champions.title: the Prophet of the Void
champions.blurb: A zealous seer dedicated to the unification of all life, Malzahar truly believes the newly emergent Void to be the path to Runeterra's salvation. In the desert wastes of Shurima, he followed the voices that whispered in his mind, all the way to ancient...

abilities.name: Call of the Void
abilities.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

abilities.name: Void Swarm
abilities.description: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Destroying summoned Voidlings does NOT give cs

abilities.name: Malefic Visions
abilities.description: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

abilities.name: Nether Grasp
abilities.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

passive.name: Void Shift
passive.description: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

champions.name: Maokai
champions.title: the Twisted Treant
champions.blurb: Maokai is a rageful, towering treant who fights the unnatural horrors of the Shadow Isles. He was twisted into a force of vengeance after a magical cataclysm destroyed his home, surviving undeath only through the Waters of Life infused within his...

abilities.name: Bramble Smash
abilities.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Twisted Advance
abilities.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.

abilities.name: Sapling Toss
abilities.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.

passive.name: Sap Magic
passive.description: Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

champions.name: Master Yi
champions.title: the Wuju Bladesman
champions.blurb: Master Yi has tempered his body and sharpened his mind, so that thought and action have become almost as one. Though he chooses to enter into violence only as a last resort, the grace and speed of his blade ensures resolution is always swift. As one of...

abilities.name: Alpha Strike
abilities.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

abilities.name: Meditate
abilities.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

abilities.name: Wuju Style
abilities.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.

abilities.name: Highlander
abilities.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Move Speed and Attack Speed as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

passive.name: Double Strike
passive.description: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.

champions.name: Mel
champions.title: the Soul's Reflection
champions.blurb: Mel Medarda is the presumed heir of the Medarda family, once one of the most powerful in Noxus. In appearance she is a graceful aristocrat, but beneath the surface lies a skilled politician who makes it her business to know everything about everyone she...

abilities.name: Radiant Volley
abilities.description: Mel fires a barrage of projectiles that explode around a target location, dealing damage repeatedly to enemies within the area.

abilities.name: Rebuttal
abilities.description: Mel forms a barrier around herself that reflects enemy projectiles back at the attacker, prevents her from taking damage, and grants her movement speed.

abilities.name: Solar Snare
abilities.description: Mel fires a radiant orb forward, rooting those at its center while the area around it slows enemies and deals damage over time.

abilities.name: Golden Eclipse
abilities.description: Mel strikes all enemies marked with Overwhelm regardless of their distance from her, dealing additional damage for each stack of Overwhelm.Ranks of Golden Eclipse increase Overwhelm's damage.

passive.name: Searing Brilliance
passive.description: Whenever Mel uses an ability, she gains three bonus projectiles (up to nine maximum) on her next attack.When Mel deals damage through an ability or attack, she applies Overwhelm, which can stack infinitely. If the enemy is hit by Mel with enough Overwhelm damage, the stacks are consumed to execute the target.

champions.name: Milio
champions.title: The Gentle Flame
champions.blurb: Milio is a warmhearted boy from Ixtal who has, despite his young age, mastered the fire axiom and discovered something new: soothing fire. With this newfound power, Milio plans to help his family escape their exile by joining the Yun Tal—just like his...

abilities.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick
abilities.description: Kick a ball that knocks back an enemy. The ball launches upward on hit and falls toward the enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in the area upon impact.

abilities.name: Cozy Campfire
abilities.description: Create an empowering zone that heals allies and increases attack range to those inside. The zone follows the ally nearest to the cast point.

abilities.name: Warm Hugs
abilities.description: Milio tosses a shield to an ally, temporarily increasing their movement speed. This ability has 2 charges.

abilities.name: Breath of Life
abilities.description: Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames that heal and remove crowd control effects from allies in range.

passive.name: Fired Up!
passive.description: Milio's abilities enchant allies on touch, making their next damage deal a burst of extra damage and burn the target.

champions.name: Miss Fortune
champions.title: the Bounty Hunter
champions.blurb: A Bilgewater captain famed for her looks but feared for her ruthlessness, Sarah Fortune paints a stark figure among the hardened criminals of the port city. As a child, she witnessed the reaver king Gangplank murder her family—an act she brutally...

abilities.name: Double Up
abilities.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

abilities.name: Strut
abilities.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Move Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

abilities.name: Make It Rain
abilities.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

abilities.name: Bullet Time
abilities.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

passive.name: Love Tap
passive.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.

champions.name: Mordekaiser
champions.title: the Iron Revenant
champions.blurb: Twice slain and thrice born, Mordekaiser is a brutal warlord from a foregone epoch who uses his necromantic sorcery to bind souls into an eternity of servitude. Few now remain who remember his earlier conquests, or know the true extent of his powers—but...

abilities.name: Obliterate
abilities.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

abilities.name: Indestructible
abilities.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.

abilities.name: Death's Grasp
abilities.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Realm of Death
abilities.description: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.

passive.name: Darkness Rise
passive.description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.

champions.name: Morgana
champions.title: the Fallen
champions.blurb: Conflicted between her celestial and mortal natures, Morgana bound her wings to embrace humanity, and inflicts her pain and bitterness upon the dishonest and the corrupt. She rejects laws and traditions she believes are unjust, and fights for truth from...

abilities.name: Dark Binding
abilities.description: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Tormented Shadow
abilities.description: Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are.

abilities.name: Black Shield
abilities.description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

abilities.name: Soul Shackles
abilities.description: Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.

passive.name: Soul Siphon
passive.description: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.

champions.name: Naafiri
champions.title: the Hound of a Hundred Bites
champions.blurb: Across the sands of Shurima, a chorus of howls rings out. It is the call of the dune hounds, voracious predators who form packs and compete for the right to hunt in these barren lands. Among them, one pack stands above all, for they are driven not only...

abilities.name: Darkin Daggers
abilities.description: Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding.Packmates leap to attack the first champion or monster hit by this skill.

abilities.name: The Call of the Pack
abilities.description: Naafiri becomes Untargetable and empowers her pack, spawning additional packmates and gaining increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.

abilities.name: Hounds' Pursuit
abilities.description: Naafiri and her packmates dash at a champion, dealing damage. Naafiri reveals nearby enemies if she scores a takedown and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants a shield.

passive.name: We Are More
passive.description: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.
passive.notes: Killing the spawned packmates does NOT give cs

champions.name: Nami
champions.title: the Tidecaller
champions.blurb: A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken. With no other option, she took it upon herself to complete the sacred...

abilities.name: Aqua Prison
abilities.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

abilities.name: Ebb and Flow
abilities.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
abilities.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

passive.name: Surging Tides
passive.description: When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.

champions.name: Nasus
champions.title: the Curator of the Sands
champions.blurb: Nasus is an imposing, jackal-headed Ascended being from ancient Shurima, a heroic figure regarded as a demigod by the people of the desert. Fiercely intelligent, he was a guardian of knowledge and peerless strategist whose wisdom guided the ancient...

abilities.name: Siphoning Strike
abilities.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

abilities.name: Wither
abilities.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Move Speed and Attack Speed over time.

abilities.name: Spirit Fire
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

abilities.name: Fury of the Sands
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

passive.name: Soul Eater
passive.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

champions.name: Nautilus
champions.title: the Titan of the Depths
champions.blurb: A lonely legend as old as the first piers sunk in Bilgewater, the armored goliath known as Nautilus roams the dark waters off the coast of the Blue Flame Isles. Driven by a forgotten betrayal, he strikes without warning, swinging his enormous anchor to...

abilities.name: Dredge Line
abilities.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.

abilities.name: Titan's Wrath
abilities.description: Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Depth Charge
abilities.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

passive.name: Staggering Blow
passive.description: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.

champions.name: Neeko
champions.title: the Curious Chameleon
champions.blurb: Hailing from a long lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others, even absorbing something of their emotional state to tell friend from foe in an instant. No one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be...

abilities.name: Blooming Burst
abilities.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

abilities.name: Shapesplitter
abilities.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack, briefly increasing her move speed. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction and recast to change the direction of the clone.
abilities.notes: Killing the clone does NOT give cs

abilities.name: Tangle-Barbs
abilities.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damages and roots everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

abilities.name: Pop Blossom
abilities.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air, knocking up all nearby enemies. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

passive.name: Inherent Glamour
passive.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion or as other units on the map. Receiving immobilizing crowd control, casting damaging spells, damaging enemy towers as a non-champion, or your disguise taking damage equal to its healthbar breaks the disguise.
passive.notes: Killing Neeko disguised as a monster or minion does NOT give cs

champions.name: Nidalee
champions.title: the Bestial Huntress
champions.blurb: Raised in the deepest jungle, Nidalee is a master tracker who can shapeshift into a ferocious cougar at will. Neither wholly woman nor beast, she viciously defends her territory from any and all trespassers, with carefully placed traps and deft spear...

abilities.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

abilities.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
abilities.notes: Destroying human form trap gives cs

abilities.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

abilities.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
abilities.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

passive.name: Prowl
passive.description: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Move Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Move Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

champions.name: Nilah
champions.title: the Joy Unbound
champions.blurb: Nilah is an ascetic warrior from a distant land, seeking the world's deadliest, most titanic opponents so that she might challenge and destroy them. Having won her power through an encounter with the long-imprisoned demon of joy, she has no emotions...

abilities.name: Formless Blade
abilities.description: With a snap of her whip-blade, Nilah damages any enemies she hits in a straight line in her chosen direction. This action extends her attack range for a short duration.

abilities.name: Jubilant Veil
abilities.description: Nilah envelops herself in mist, increasing her movement speed and allowing her to gracefully dodge all incoming attacks. Any allies she touches during the mist's duration will also gain this effect.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: Nilah enthusiastically dashes toward her target, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through on the way.

abilities.name: Apotheosis
abilities.description: Twirling her whip-blade in joyful exuberance, Nilah deals damage to enemies around her before pulling them closer with her weapon.

passive.name: Joy Unending
passive.description: Nilah gains increased experience from last-hitting minions along with the ability to enhance and share nearby healing and shielding from her allies.

champions.name: Nocturne
champions.title: the Eternal Nightmare
champions.blurb: A demonic amalgamation drawn from the nightmares that haunt every sentient mind, the thing known as Nocturne has become a primordial force of pure evil. It is liquidly chaotic in aspect, a faceless shadow with cold eyes and armed with wicked-looking...

abilities.name: Duskbringer
abilities.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Shroud of Darkness
abilities.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

abilities.name: Unspeakable Horror
abilities.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

passive.name: Umbra Blades
passive.description: Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.

champions.name: Nunu & Willump
champions.title: the Boy and His Yeti
champions.blurb: Once upon a time, there was a boy who wanted to prove he was a hero by slaying a fearsome monster—only to discover that the beast, a lonely and magical yeti, merely needed a friend. Bound together by ancient power and a shared love of snowballs, Nunu...

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

abilities.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
abilities.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.

abilities.name: Snowball Barrage
abilities.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

abilities.name: Absolute Zero
abilities.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

passive.name: Call of the Freljord
passive.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.

champions.name: Olaf
champions.title: the Berserker
champions.blurb: An unstoppable force of destruction, the axe-wielding Olaf wants nothing but to die in glorious combat. Hailing from the brutal Freljordian peninsula of Lokfar, he once received a prophecy foretelling his peaceful passing—a coward's fate, and a great...

abilities.name: Undertow
abilities.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and reducing their Armor and Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Tough It Out
abilities.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased and he gains a Shield.

abilities.name: Reckless Swing
abilities.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

abilities.name: Ragnarok
abilities.description: Olaf passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking.

passive.name: Berserker Rage
passive.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed and Life Steal based on his missing Health.

champions.name: Orianna
champions.title: the Lady of Clockwork
champions.blurb: Once a curious girl of flesh and blood, Orianna is now a technological marvel comprised entirely of clockwork. She became gravely ill after an accident in the lower districts of Zaun, and her failing body had to be replaced with exquisite artifice...

abilities.name: Command: Attack
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

abilities.name: Command: Dissonance
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Command: Protect
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, Shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

abilities.name: Command: Shockwave
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

passive.name: Clockwork Windup
passive.description: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.

champions.name: Ornn
champions.title: The Fire below the Mountain
champions.blurb: Ornn is the Freljordian spirit of forging and craftsmanship. He works in the solitude of a massive smithy, hammered out from the lava caverns beneath the volcano Hearth-Home. There he stokes bubbling cauldrons of molten rock to purify ores and fashion...

abilities.name: Volcanic Rupture
abilities.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

abilities.name: Bellows Breath
abilities.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

abilities.name: Searing Charge
abilities.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

abilities.name: Call of the Forge God
abilities.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

passive.name: Living Forge
passive.description: Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.

champions.name: Pantheon
champions.title: the Unbreakable Spear
champions.blurb: Once an unwilling host to the Aspect of War, Atreus survived when the celestial power within him was slain, refusing to succumb to a blow that tore stars from the heavens. In time, he learned to embrace the power of his own mortality, and the stubborn...

abilities.name: Comet Spear
abilities.description: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

abilities.name: Shield Vault
abilities.description: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.

abilities.name: Aegis Assault
abilities.description: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.

abilities.name: Grand Starfall
abilities.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.

passive.name: Mortal Will
passive.description: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

champions.name: Poppy
champions.title: Keeper of the Hammer
champions.blurb: Runeterra has no shortage of valiant champions, but few are as tenacious as Poppy. Bearing the legendary hammer of Orlon, a weapon twice her size, this determined yordle has spent untold years searching in secret for the fabled “Hero of Demacia,” said...

abilities.name: Hammer Shock
abilities.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

abilities.name: Steadfast Presence
abilities.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.

abilities.name: Heroic Charge
abilities.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

abilities.name: Keeper's Verdict
abilities.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

passive.name: Iron Ambassador
passive.description: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.

champions.name: Pyke
champions.title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
champions.blurb: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural...

abilities.name: Bone Skewer
abilities.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

abilities.name: Ghostwater Dive
abilities.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.

abilities.name: Phantom Undertow
abilities.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.

abilities.name: Death From Below
abilities.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.

passive.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
passive.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

champions.name: Qiyana
champions.title: Empress of the Elements
champions.blurb: In the jungle city of Ixaocan, Qiyana plots her own ruthless path to the high seat of the Yun Tal. Last in line to succeed her parents, she faces those who stand in her way with brash confidence and unprecedented mastery over elemental magic. With the...

abilities.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
abilities.description: Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.

abilities.name: Terrashape
abilities.description: Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted.

abilities.name: Audacity
abilities.description: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them.

abilities.name: Supreme Display of Talent
abilities.description: Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

passive.name: Royal Privilege
passive.description: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

champions.name: Quinn
champions.title: Demacia's Wings
champions.blurb: Quinn is an elite ranger-knight of Demacia, who undertakes dangerous missions deep in enemy territory. She and her legendary eagle, Valor, share an unbreakable bond, and their foes are often slain before they realize they are fighting not one, but two...

abilities.name: Blinding Assault
abilities.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.

abilities.name: Heightened Senses
abilities.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Move Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

abilities.name: Behind Enemy Lines
abilities.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.

passive.name: Harrier
passive.description: Valor, Quinn's Demacian eagle, periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable. Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.

champions.name: Rakan
champions.title: The Charmer
champions.blurb: As mercurial as he is charming, Rakan is an infamous vastayan troublemaker and the greatest battle-dancer in Lhotlan tribal history. To the humans of the Ionian highlands, his name has long been synonymous with wild festivals, uncontrollable parties...

abilities.name: Gleaming Quill
abilities.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

abilities.name: Grand Entrance
abilities.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

abilities.name: Battle Dance
abilities.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

abilities.name: The Quickness
abilities.description: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

passive.name: Fey Feathers
passive.description: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

champions.name: Rammus
champions.title: the Armordillo
champions.blurb: Idolized by many, dismissed by some, mystifying to all, the curious being Rammus is an enigma. Protected by a spiked shell, he inspires increasingly disparate theories on his origin wherever he goes—from demigod, to sacred oracle, to a mere beast...

abilities.name: Powerball
abilities.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

abilities.name: Defensive Ball Curl
abilities.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, and returning damage to enemies that attack him.

abilities.name: Frenzying Taunt
abilities.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him.

abilities.name: Soaring Slam
abilities.description: Rammus hops into the air and slams down at a target area, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If cast while Rammus is in Powerball, Rammus knocks up enemies near the center as well.

passive.name: Spiked Shell
passive.description: Rammus gains bonus Attack Damage scaling with his Armor and Magic Resistance.

champions.name: Rek'Sai
champions.title: the Void Burrower
champions.blurb: An apex predator, Rek'Sai is a merciless Void-spawn that tunnels beneath the ground to ambush and devour unsuspecting prey. Her insatiable hunger has laid waste to entire regions of the once-great empire of Shurima—merchants, traders, even armed...

abilities.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
abilities.description: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that damages and reveals enemies hit.

abilities.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
abilities.description: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Unburrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
abilities.description: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing physical damage, or bonus true damage if she has max Fury.While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
abilities.notes: Destroying tunnels does NOT give cs

abilities.name: Void Rush
abilities.description: Rek'Sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their maximum health.

passive.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
passive.description: Rek'Sai generates Fury by Attacking and hitting with basic Abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

champions.name: Rell
champions.title: the Iron Maiden
champions.blurb: The product of brutal experimentation at the hands of the Black Rose, Rell is a defiant, living weapon determined to topple Noxus. Her childhood was one of misery and horror, enduring unspeakable procedures to perfect and weaponize her magical control...

abilities.name: Shattering Strike
abilities.description: Rell deals magic damage to units in a line, breaking their shields and stunning them.

abilities.name: Ferromancy: Crash Down
abilities.description: Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashing down in her armor, Knocking enemies up and gaining a large Shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is Slowed.Dismounted: Rell forms her Mount, gaining a burst of speed and Knocking Up the next enemy she attacks.

abilities.name: Full Tilt
abilities.description: Passive: Rell gains out of combat Move Speed.Active: Rell and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Magnet Storm
abilities.description: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies toward herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies toward herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.

passive.name: Break the Mold
passive.description: Rell's Attacks and Abilities deal additional magic damage and steal Armor and Magic Resist on hit.

champions.name: Renata Glasc
champions.title: the Chem-Baroness
champions.blurb: Renata Glasc rose from the ashes of her childhood home with nothing but her name and her parents' alchemical research. In the decades since, she has become Zaun's wealthiest chem-baron, a business magnate who built her power by tying everyone's...

abilities.name: Handshake
abilities.description: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.

abilities.name: Bailout
abilities.description: Renata buffs an allied champion to fight harder, delaying their death and potentially saving them if they get a takedown.

abilities.name: Loyalty Program
abilities.description: Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, shielding allies and damaging and slowing enemies hit.

abilities.name: Hostile Takeover
abilities.description: Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.
abilities.notes: If Renata casts her ultimate on you and you take one of your own minions it does NOT give you cs

passive.name: Leverage
passive.description: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.

champions.name: Renekton
champions.title: the Butcher of the Sands
champions.blurb: Renekton is a terrifying, rage-fueled Ascended being from the scorched deserts of Shurima. Once, he was his empire's most esteemed warrior, leading the nation's armies to countless victories. However, after the empire's fall, Renekton was entombed...

abilities.name: Cull the Meek
abilities.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

abilities.name: Ruthless Predator
abilities.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Slice and Dice
abilities.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

abilities.name: Dominus
abilities.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

passive.name: Reign of Anger
passive.description: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.

champions.name: Rengar
champions.title: the Pridestalker
champions.blurb: Rengar is a ferocious vastayan trophy hunter who lives for the thrill of tracking down and killing dangerous creatures. He scours the world for the most fearsome beasts he can find, especially seeking any trace of Kha'Zix, the void creature who...

abilities.name: Savagery
abilities.description: Rengar's next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Battle Roar
abilities.description: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

abilities.name: Bola Strike
abilities.description: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.Ferocity effect: roots the target.

abilities.name: Thrill of the Hunt
abilities.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.

passive.name: Unseen Predator
passive.description: While in Brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.Rengar generates Ferocity whenever he casts an ability. At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered.Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage.

champions.name: Riven
champions.title: the Exile
champions.blurb: Once a swordmaster in the warhosts of Noxus, Riven is an expatriate in a land she previously tried to conquer. She rose through the ranks on the strength of her conviction and brutal efficiency, and was rewarded with a legendary runic blade and a...

abilities.name: Broken Wings
abilities.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ki Burst
abilities.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Valor
abilities.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

abilities.name: Blade of the Exile
abilities.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

passive.name: Runic Blade
passive.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.

champions.name: Rumble
champions.title: the Mechanized Menace
champions.blurb: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff...

abilities.name: Flamespitter
abilities.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

abilities.name: Scrap Shield
abilities.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

abilities.name: Electro Harpoon
abilities.description: Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage, slowing their Move Speed, and reducing their Magic Resist. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

abilities.name: The Equalizer
abilities.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

passive.name: Junkyard Titan
passive.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

champions.name: Ryze
champions.title: the Rune Mage
champions.blurb: Widely considered one of the most adept sorcerers on Runeterra, Ryze is an ancient, hard-bitten archmage with an impossibly heavy burden to bear. Armed with immense arcane power and a boundless constitution, he tirelessly hunts for World Runes—fragments...

abilities.name: Overload
