abilities.description: Passively, Ryze's other basic abilities reset the cooldown of Overload and charge a rune. When Ryze casts Overload with 2 runes charged, he gains a brief burst of Move Speed.On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the target has Flux on it, Overload deals extra damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux.

abilities.name: Rune Prison
abilities.description: Ryze traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.

abilities.name: Spell Flux
abilities.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs all nearby enemies. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.

abilities.name: Realm Warp
abilities.description: Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

passive.name: Arcane Mastery
passive.description: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

champions.name: Samira
champions.title: the Desert Rose
champions.blurb: Samira stares death in the eye with unyielding confidence, seeking thrill wherever she goes. After her Shuriman home was destroyed as a child, Samira found her true calling in Noxus, where she built a reputation as a stylish daredevil taking on...

abilities.name: Flair
abilities.description: Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion.

abilities.name: Blade Whirl
abilities.description: Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles.

abilities.name: Wild Rush
abilities.description: Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.

abilities.name: Inferno Trigger
abilities.description: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her.

passive.name: Daredevil Impulse
passive.description: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by Immobilizing effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is Knocked Up, she also keeps them Knocked Up briefly.

champions.name: Sejuani
champions.title: Fury of the North
champions.blurb: Sejuani is the brutal, unforgiving Iceborn warmother of the Winter's Claw, one of the most feared tribes of the Freljord. Her people's survival is a constant, desperate battle against the elements, forcing them to raid Noxians, Demacians, and Avarosans...

abilities.name: Arctic Assault
abilities.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Winter's Wrath
abilities.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks.

abilities.name: Permafrost
abilities.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

abilities.name: Glacial Prison
abilities.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

passive.name: Fury of the North
passive.description: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

champions.name: Senna
champions.title: the Redeemer
champions.blurb: Cursed from childhood to be haunted by the supernatural Black Mist, Senna joined a sacred order known as the Sentinels of Light, and fiercely fought back—only to be killed, her soul imprisoned in a lantern by the cruel specter Thresh. But refusing to...

abilities.name: Piercing Darkness
abilities.description: From the twin barrels of her Relic Cannon, Senna fires a unified beam of light and shadow through a target, healing allies and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Last Embrace
abilities.description: Senna sends forth a wave of Black Mist. If it hits an enemy it latches onto them hungrily, rooting them and everything nearby after a brief delay.

abilities.name: Curse of the Black Mist
abilities.description: Senna draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased Move Speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities.

abilities.name: Dawning Shadow
abilities.description: Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.

passive.name: Absolution
passive.description: When units die near Senna, their souls are periodically trapped by the Black Mist. Senna can attack these souls to free them, absorbing the Mist that held them in death. Mist fuels her Relic Cannon's power with increased Attack Damage, Attack Range, and Critical Strike Chance. Attacks from Senna's Relic Cannon take longer to fire, deal bonus damage, and briefly grant her a portion of her target's Move Speed.

champions.name: Seraphine
champions.title: the Starry-Eyed Songstress
champions.blurb: Born in Piltover to Zaunite parents, Seraphine can hear the souls of others—the world sings to her, and she sings back. Though these sounds overwhelmed her in her youth, she now draws on them for inspiration, turning the chaos into a symphony. She...

abilities.name: High Note
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage in an area.

abilities.name: Surround Sound
abilities.description: Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

abilities.name: Beat Drop
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line.

abilities.name: Encore
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.

passive.name: Stage Presence
passive.description: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

champions.name: Sett
champions.title: the Boss
champions.blurb: A leader of Ionia's growing criminal underworld, Sett rose to prominence in the wake of the war with Noxus. Though he began as a humble challenger in the fighting pits of Navori, he quickly gained notoriety for his savage strength, and his ability to...

abilities.name: Knuckle Down
abilities.description: Sett's next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. Sett also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.

abilities.name: Haymaker
abilities.description: Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.

abilities.name: Facebreaker
abilities.description: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sides of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.

abilities.name: The Show Stopper
abilities.description: Sett carries an enemy champion through the air and slams them into the ground, dealing damage and slowing all enemies near where they land.

passive.name: Pit Grit
passive.description: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.

champions.name: Shaco
champions.title: the Demon Jester
champions.blurb: Crafted long ago as a plaything for a lonely prince, the enchanted marionette Shaco now delights in murder and mayhem. Corrupted by dark magic and the loss of his beloved charge, the once-kind puppet finds pleasure only in the misery of the poor souls...

abilities.name: Deceive
abilities.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind.

abilities.name: Jack In The Box
abilities.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Destroying the boxes does NOT give cs

abilities.name: Two-Shiv Poison
abilities.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health.

abilities.name: Hallucinate
abilities.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Killing the clone does give cs

passive.name: Backstab
passive.description: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.

champions.name: Shen
champions.title: the Eye of Twilight
champions.blurb: Among the secretive, Ionian warriors known as the Kinkou, Shen serves as their leader, the Eye of Twilight. He longs to remain free from the confusion of emotion, prejudice, and ego, and walks the unseen path of dispassionate judgment between the spirit...

abilities.name: Twilight Assault
abilities.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

abilities.name: Spirit's Refuge
abilities.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

abilities.name: Shadow Dash
abilities.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Stand United
abilities.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

passive.name: Ki Barrier
passive.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

champions.name: Shyvana
champions.title: the Half-Dragon
champions.blurb: Shyvana is a creature with the magic of a rune shard burning within her heart. Though she often appears humanoid, she can take her true form as a fearsome dragon, incinerating her foes with fiery breath. Having saved the life of the crown prince Jarvan...

abilities.name: Twin Bite
abilities.description: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack and grants herself Attack Speed for her next attacks. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.

abilities.name: Burnout
abilities.description: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

abilities.name: Flame Breath
abilities.description: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

abilities.name: Dragon's Descent
abilities.description: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

passive.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
passive.description: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

champions.name: Singed
champions.title: the Mad Chemist
champions.blurb: Singed is a brilliant alchemist of dubious morality, whose experiments would turn the stomach of even the most cutthroat criminal. Selling his skills to the highest bidder, he cares little for how his noxious concoctions are used, with the ensuing chaos...

abilities.name: Poison Trail
abilities.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

abilities.name: Mega Adhesive
abilities.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

abilities.name: Insanity Potion
abilities.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.

passive.name: Noxious Slipstream
passive.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

champions.name: Sion
champions.title: The Undead Juggernaut
champions.blurb: A war hero from a bygone era, Sion was revered in Noxus for choking the life out of a Demacian king with his bare hands—but, denied oblivion, he was resurrected to serve his empire even in death. His indiscriminate slaughter claimed all who stood in his...

abilities.name: Decimating Smash
abilities.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

abilities.name: Soul Furnace
abilities.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.

abilities.name: Roar of the Slayer
abilities.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
abilities.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.

passive.name: Glory in Death
passive.description: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.
passive.notes: Killing Sion in passive does NOT give cs

champions.name: Sivir
champions.title: the Battle Mistress
champions.blurb: Sivir is a renowned fortune hunter and mercenary captain who plies her trade in the deserts of Shurima. Armed with her legendary jeweled crossblade, she has fought and won countless battles for those who can afford her exorbitant price. Known for her...

abilities.name: Boomerang Blade
abilities.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

abilities.name: Ricochet
abilities.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks gain additional attack speed and bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage while bouncing.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives health and a burst of movement speed if a spell is blocked.

abilities.name: On The Hunt
abilities.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addition, Sivir's attacks reduce her spell cooldowns.

passive.name: Fleet of Foot
passive.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

champions.name: Skarner
champions.title: the Primordial Sovereign
champions.blurb: The ancient, colossal brackern Skarner is revered in Ixtal as one of the founding members of its ruling caste, the Yun Tal. Devoted to keeping his nation safe from the rest of the world, Skarner dwells in a chamber beneath Ixaocan where he can hear the...

abilities.name: Shattered Earth / Upheaval
abilities.description: Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful projectile.

abilities.name: Seismic Bastion
abilities.description: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes.

abilities.name: Ixtal's Impact
abilities.description: Skarner charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by Skarner as he moves around.

passive.name: Threads of Vibration
passive.description: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.

champions.name: Smolder
champions.title: the Fiery Fledgling
champions.blurb: Hidden amongst the craggy cliffs of the Noxian frontier, under the watchful eyes of his mother, a young dragon is learning what it means to be heir to the Camavoran imperial dragon lineage. Playful and eager to grow up, Smolder looks for any excuse to...

abilities.name: Super Scorcher Breath
abilities.description: Smolder breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful.

abilities.name: Achooo!
abilities.description: Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.

abilities.name: Flap, Flap, Flap
abilities.description: Smolder takes flight ignoring terrain and bombarding the lowest health enemy.

abilities.name: MMOOOMMMM!
abilities.description: Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire.

passive.name: Dragon Practice
passive.description: Hitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with Super Scorcher Breath grants a stack of Dragon Practice. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.

champions.name: Sona
champions.title: Maven of the Strings
champions.blurb: Sona is Demacia's foremost virtuoso of the stringed etwahl, speaking only through her graceful chords and vibrant arias. This genteel manner has endeared her to the highborn, though others suspect her spellbinding melodies to actually emanate magic—a...

abilities.name: Hymn of Valor
abilities.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

abilities.name: Aria of Perseverance
abilities.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Song of Celerity
abilities.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed.

abilities.name: Crescendo
abilities.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them.

passive.name: Power Chord
passive.description: Accelerando: Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead.Power Chord: Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.

champions.name: Soraka
champions.title: the Starchild
champions.blurb: A wanderer from the celestial dimensions beyond Mount Targon, Soraka gave up her immortality to protect the mortal races from their own more violent instincts. She endeavors to spread the virtues of compassion and mercy to everyone she meets—even...

abilities.name: Starcall
abilities.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.

abilities.name: Astral Infusion
abilities.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

abilities.name: Equinox
abilities.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

abilities.name: Wish
abilities.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.

passive.name: Salvation
passive.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

champions.name: Swain
champions.title: the Noxian Grand General
champions.blurb: Jericho Swain is the visionary ruler of Noxus, an expansionist nation that reveres only strength. Though he was cast down and crippled in the Ionian wars, his left arm severed, he seized control of the empire with ruthless determination… and a new...

abilities.name: Death's Hand
abilities.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

abilities.name: Vision of Empire
abilities.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

abilities.name: Nevermove
abilities.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension.

abilities.name: Demonic Ascension
abilities.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate and slow nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire. This form is indefinite as long as Swain drains enemy champions.

passive.name: Ravenous Flock
passive.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health.

champions.name: Sylas
champions.title: the Unshackled
champions.blurb: Raised in one of Demacia's lesser quarters, Sylas of Dregbourne has come to symbolize the darker side of the Great City. As a boy, his ability to root out hidden sorcery caught the attention of the notorious mageseekers, who eventually imprisoned him...

abilities.name: Chain Lash
abilities.description: Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies. After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.

abilities.name: Kingslayer
abilities.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

abilities.name: Abscond / Abduct
abilities.description: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.

abilities.name: Hijack
abilities.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.

passive.name: Petricite Burst
passive.description: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.

champions.name: Syndra
champions.title: the Dark Sovereign
champions.blurb: Syndra is a fearsome Ionian mage with incredible power at her command. As a child, she disturbed the village elders with her reckless and wild magic. She was sent away to be taught greater control, but eventually discovered her supposed mentor was...

abilities.name: Dark Sphere
abilities.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies.

abilities.name: Scatter the Weak
abilities.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

abilities.name: Unleashed Power
abilities.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

passive.name: Transcendent
passive.description: Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities.Dark Sphere: Syndra can hold an additional chargeForce of Will: Bonus true damage.Scatter the Weak: Increased width and slows all targetsUnleashed Power: Executes low health targets

champions.name: Tahm Kench
champions.title: The River King
champions.blurb: Known by many names throughout history, the demon Tahm Kench travels the waterways of Runeterra, feeding his insatiable appetite with the misery of others. Though he may appear singularly charming and proud, he swaggers through the physical realm like a...

abilities.name: Tongue Lash
abilities.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion.Applies a stack of  An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.

abilities.name: Abyssal Dive
abilities.description: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.description: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat.Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally.

passive.name: An Acquired Taste
passive.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

champions.name: Taliyah
champions.title: the Stoneweaver
champions.blurb: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe...

abilities.name: Threaded Volley
abilities.description: Taliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Worked Ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on Worked Ground, she consumes the ground to throw a stronger boulder that slows enemies.

abilities.name: Seismic Shove
abilities.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.

abilities.name: Unraveled Earth
abilities.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.

abilities.name: Weaver's Wall
abilities.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

passive.name: Rock Surfing
passive.description: Taliyah gains Move Speed near walls.

champions.name: Talon
champions.title: the Blade's Shadow
champions.blurb: Talon is the knife in the darkness, a merciless killer able to strike without warning and escape before any alarm is raised. He carved out a dangerous reputation on the brutal streets of Noxus, where he was forced to fight, kill, and steal to survive...

abilities.name: Noxian Diplomacy
abilities.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

abilities.name: Rake
abilities.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

abilities.name: Assassin's Path
abilities.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

abilities.name: Shadow Assault
abilities.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Move Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

passive.name: Blade's End
passive.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

champions.name: Taric
champions.title: the Shield of Valoran
champions.blurb: Taric is the Aspect of the Protector, wielding incredible power as Runeterra's guardian of life, love, and beauty. Shamed by a dereliction of duty and exiled from his homeland Demacia, Taric ascended Mount Targon to find redemption, only to discover a...

abilities.name: Starlight's Touch
abilities.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

abilities.name: Bastion
abilities.description: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

abilities.name: Dazzle
abilities.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Cosmic Radiance
abilities.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

passive.name: Bravado
passive.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

champions.name: Teemo
champions.title: the Swift Scout
champions.blurb: Undeterred by even the most dangerous and threatening of obstacles, Teemo scouts the world with boundless enthusiasm and a cheerful spirit. A yordle with an unwavering sense of morality, he takes pride in following the Bandle Scout's Code, sometimes...

abilities.name: Blinding Dart
abilities.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

abilities.name: Move Quick
abilities.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

abilities.name: Toxic Shot
abilities.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Trap
abilities.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
abilities.notes: Destroying the mushroom gives cs

passive.name: Guerrilla Warfare
passive.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

champions.name: Thresh
champions.title: the Chain Warden
champions.blurb: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless specter of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he was undone by a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with...

abilities.name: Death Sentence
abilities.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

abilities.name: Dark Passage
abilities.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

abilities.name: Flay
abilities.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

abilities.name: The Box
abilities.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

passive.name: Damnation
passive.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

champions.name: Tristana
champions.title: the Yordle Gunner
champions.blurb: While many other yordles channel their energy into discovery, invention, or just plain mischief-making, Tristana was always inspired by the adventures of great warriors. She had heard much about Runeterra, its factions, and its wars, and believed her...

abilities.name: Rapid Fire
abilities.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Rocket Jump
abilities.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

abilities.name: Explosive Charge
abilities.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

abilities.name: Buster Shot
abilities.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

passive.name: Draw a Bead
passive.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

champions.name: Trundle
champions.title: the Troll King
champions.blurb: Trundle is a hulking and devious troll with a particularly vicious streak, and there is nothing he cannot bludgeon into submission—not even the Freljord itself. Fiercely territorial, he chases down anyone foolish enough to enter his domain. Then, his...

abilities.name: Chomp
abilities.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Domain
abilities.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

abilities.name: Pillar of Ice
abilities.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

passive.name: King's Tribute
passive.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

champions.name: Tryndamere
champions.title: the Barbarian King
champions.blurb: Fueled by unbridled fury and rage, Tryndamere once carved his way through the Freljord, openly challenging the greatest warriors of the north to prepare himself for even darker days ahead. The wrathful barbarian has long sought revenge for the...

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

abilities.name: Mocking Shout
abilities.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Move Speed reduced.

abilities.name: Spinning Slash
abilities.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Undying Rage
abilities.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

passive.name: Battle Fury
passive.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

champions.name: Twisted Fate
champions.title: the Card Master
champions.blurb: Twisted Fate is an infamous cardsharp and swindler who has gambled and charmed his way across much of the known world, earning the enmity and admiration of the rich and foolish alike. He rarely takes things seriously, greeting each day with a mocking...

abilities.name: Wild Cards
abilities.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

abilities.name: Pick a Card
abilities.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

abilities.name: Stacked Deck
abilities.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

abilities.name: Destiny
abilities.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

passive.name: Loaded Dice
passive.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.

champions.name: Twitch
champions.title: the Plague Rat
champions.blurb: A Zaunite plague rat by birth, but a connoisseur of filth by passion, Twitch is not afraid to get his paws dirty. Aiming a chem-powered crossbow at the gilded heart of Piltover, he has vowed to show those in the city above just how filthy they really...

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Venom Cask
abilities.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

abilities.name: Contaminate
abilities.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

abilities.name: Spray and Pray
abilities.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

passive.name: Deadly Venom
passive.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

champions.name: Udyr
champions.title: the Spirit Walker
champions.blurb: The most powerful spirit walker alive, Udyr communes with all the spirits of the Freljord, whether by empathically understanding their needs, or by channeling and transforming their ethereal energy into his own primal fighting style. He seeks balance...

abilities.name: Wilding Claw
abilities.description: Udyr gains attack speed and his next two attacks deal bonus physical damage. Recast: Gain even more attack speed, and the next two attacks call lightning to strike the target.

abilities.name: Iron Mantle
abilities.description: Udyr gains a shield and his next two attacks heal him. Recast: Gain an even bigger shield and heal based on max health over the next couple seconds.

abilities.name: Blazing Stampede
abilities.description: Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.

abilities.name: Wingborne Storm
abilities.description: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.

passive.name: Bridge Between
passive.description: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with Ultimate benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.

champions.name: Urgot
champions.title: the Dreadnought
champions.blurb: Once a powerful Noxian headsman, Urgot was betrayed by the empire for which he had killed so many. Bound in iron chains, he was forced to learn the true meaning of strength in the Dredge—a prison mine deep beneath Zaun. Emerging in a disaster that...

abilities.name: Corrosive Charge
abilities.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.description: Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

abilities.name: Disdain
abilities.description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

abilities.name: Fear Beyond Death
abilities.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

passive.name: Echoing Flames
passive.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

champions.name: Varus
champions.title: the Arrow of Retribution
champions.blurb: One of the ancient darkin, Varus was a deadly killer who loved to torment his foes, driving them almost to insanity before delivering the killing arrow. He was imprisoned at the end of the Great Darkin War, but escaped centuries later in the remade...

abilities.name: Piercing Arrow
abilities.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

abilities.name: Blighted Quiver
abilities.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

abilities.name: Hail of Arrows
abilities.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

abilities.name: Chain of Corruption
abilities.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

passive.name: Living Vengeance
passive.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Damage and Ability Power. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

champions.name: Vayne
champions.title: the Night Hunter
champions.blurb: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when...

abilities.name: Tumble
abilities.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Silver Bolts
abilities.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Final Hour
abilities.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter

passive.name: Night Hunter
passive.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

champions.name: Veigar
champions.title: the Tiny Master of Evil
champions.blurb: An enthusiastic master of dark sorcery, Veigar has embraced powers that few mortals dare approach. As a free-spirited inhabitant of Bandle City, he longed to push beyond the limitations of yordle magic, and turned instead to arcane texts that had been...

abilities.name: Baleful Strike
abilities.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

abilities.name: Dark Matter
abilities.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

abilities.name: Event Horizon
abilities.description: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

abilities.name: Primordial Burst
abilities.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

passive.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
passive.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

champions.name: Vel'Koz
champions.title: the Eye of the Void
champions.blurb: It is unclear if Vel'Koz was the first Void-spawn to emerge on Runeterra, but there has certainly never been another to match his level of cruel, calculating sentience. While his kin devour or defile everything around them, he seeks instead to...

abilities.name: Plasma Fission
abilities.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

abilities.name: Void Rift
abilities.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

abilities.name: Tectonic Disruption
abilities.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

abilities.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
abilities.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

passive.name: Organic Deconstruction
passive.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

champions.name: Vex
champions.title: the Gloomist
champions.blurb: In the black heart of the Shadow Isles, a lone yordle trudges through the spectral fog, content in its murky misery. With an endless supply of teen angst and a powerful shadow in tow, Vex lives in her own self-made slice of gloom, far from the revolting...

abilities.name: Mistral Bolt
abilities.description: Launch a damaging missile that accelerates mid-flight.

abilities.name: Personal Space
abilities.description: Gain a shield and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Looming Darkness
abilities.description: Summon a damaging and slowing zone that applies Gloom to enemies.

abilities.name: Shadow Surge
abilities.description: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion.  Recast to dash to them and deal damage.

passive.name: Doom 'n Gloom
passive.description: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.

champions.name: Vi
champions.title: the Piltover Enforcer
champions.blurb: Raised on the mean streets of Zaun, Vi is a hotheaded, impulsive, and fearsome woman with very little respect for authority. She has always been a shrewd survivor, both from her youthful troublemaking topside and an unfairly long stint in Stillwater...

abilities.name: Vault Breaker
abilities.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

abilities.name: Denting Blows
abilities.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Relentless Force
abilities.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

abilities.name: Cease and Desist
abilities.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

passive.name: Blast Shield
passive.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

champions.name: Viego
champions.title: The Ruined King
champions.blurb: Once ruler of a long-lost kingdom, Viego perished over a thousand years ago when his attempt to bring his wife back from the dead triggered the magical catastrophe known as the Ruination. Transformed into a powerful, unliving specter tortured by an...

abilities.name: Blade of the Ruined King
abilities.description: Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health.Viego can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.

abilities.name: Spectral Maw
abilities.description: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Harrowed Path
abilities.description: Viego commands the Black Mist to haunt and surround a piece of terrain. Viego can hide in the Mist as a wraith, gaining camouflage, Move Speed, and Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Heartbreaker
abilities.description: Viego teleports to a nearby location and executes an enemy champion on arrival, piercing their heart and causing a destructive shockwave around them that knocks away their allies.

passive.name: Sovereign's Domination
passive.description: Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths. By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.

champions.name: Viktor
champions.title: the Herald of the Arcane
champions.blurb: The fully biomechanical evolution of his former self, Viktor has embraced his Glorious Evolution and become something of a messiah to his followers. He sacrificed his own humanity under the logic that eliminating emotion would thereby eliminate...

abilities.name: Siphon Power
abilities.description: Viktor blasts an enemy unit with magic damage, which grants him a shield and empowers his next basic attack.Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus move speed after casting the Ability.

abilities.name: Gravity Field
abilities.description: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies caught within its radius. Enemies who stay in the field for too long become stunned.Augment: Viktor's spells apply a slow to enemies.

abilities.name: Hextech Ray
abilities.description: Viktor uses his biomechanical arm to fire a Hextech Ray that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.Augment: An explosion follows in the Hextech Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Storm
abilities.description: Viktor conjures an Arcane Storm on the field, dealing magic damage and interrupting enemy channels. The storm periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies and can be redirected by Viktor.Augment: The Arcane Storm moves 25% faster, and whenever champions die after taking damage from it, the storm grows and increases in its duration.

passive.name: Glorious Evolution
passive.description: Viktor gains Hex Fragments whenever he kills an enemy. With every 100 Hex Fragments he obtains, Viktor permanently augments an active ability. After upgrading all of his basic abilities, he can gather 100 Hex Fragments to augment his ultimate ability.

champions.name: Vladimir
champions.title: the Crimson Reaper
champions.blurb: A fiend with a thirst for mortal blood, Vladimir has influenced the affairs of Noxus since the empire's earliest days. In addition to unnaturally extending his life, his mastery of hemomancy allows him to control the minds and bodies of others as easily...

abilities.name: Transfusion
abilities.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

abilities.name: Sanguine Pool
abilities.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

abilities.name: Tides of Blood
abilities.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

abilities.name: Hemoplague
abilities.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

passive.name: Crimson Pact
passive.description: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

champions.name: Volibear
champions.title: the Relentless Storm
champions.blurb: To those who still revere him, the Volibear is the storm made manifest. Destructive, wild, and stubbornly resolute, he existed before mortals walked the Freljord's tundra, and is fiercely protective of the lands that he and his demi-god kin created...

abilities.name: Thundering Smash
abilities.description: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, Stunning and damaging the first one he Attacks.

abilities.name: Frenzied Maul
abilities.description: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.

abilities.name: Sky Splitter
abilities.description: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.

abilities.name: Stormbringer
abilities.description: Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health.  Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled.

passive.name: The Relentless Storm
passive.description: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.

champions.name: Warwick
champions.title: the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun
champions.blurb: Warwick is a monster who hunts the gray alleys of Zaun. Transformed by agonizing experiments, his body is fused with an intricate system of chambers and pumps, machinery filling his veins with alchemical rage. He bursts from the shadows to prey upon...

abilities.name: Jaws of the Beast
abilities.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

abilities.name: Blood Hunt
abilities.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

abilities.name: Primal Howl
abilities.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

abilities.name: Infinite Duress
abilities.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

passive.name: Eternal Hunger
passive.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

champions.name: Wukong
champions.title: the Monkey King
champions.blurb: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial...

abilities.name: Crushing Blow
abilities.description: Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Warrior Trickster
abilities.description: Wukong becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Killing the clone gives cs

abilities.name: Nimbus Strike
abilities.description: Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.

passive.name: Stone Skin
passive.description: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.

champions.name: Xayah
champions.title: the Rebel
champions.blurb: Deadly and precise, Xayah is a vastayan revolutionary waging a personal war to save her people. She uses her speed, guile, and razor-sharp feather blades to cut down anyone who stands in her way. Xayah fights alongside her partner and lover, Rakan, to...

abilities.name: Double Daggers
abilities.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: Deadly Plumage
abilities.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.

abilities.name: Bladecaller
abilities.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

abilities.name: Featherstorm
abilities.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

passive.name: Clean Cuts
passive.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a Feather.

champions.name: Xerath
champions.title: the Magus Ascendant
champions.blurb: Xerath is an Ascended Magus of ancient Shurima, a being of arcane energy writhing in the broken shards of a magical sarcophagus. For millennia, he was trapped beneath the desert sands, but the rise of Shurima freed him from his ancient prison. Driven...

abilities.name: Arcanopulse
abilities.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

abilities.name: Eye of Destruction
abilities.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

abilities.name: Shocking Orb
abilities.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

abilities.name: Rite of the Arcane
abilities.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

passive.name: Mana Surge
passive.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana. Whenever Xerath kills a unit, this cooldown is reduced.

champions.name: Xin Zhao
champions.title: the Seneschal of Demacia
champions.blurb: Xin Zhao is a resolute warrior loyal to the ruling Lightshield dynasty. Once condemned to the fighting pits of Noxus, he survived countless gladiatorial bouts, but after being freed by Demacian forces, he swore his life and allegiance to these brave...

abilities.name: Three Talon Strike
abilities.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

abilities.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
abilities.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies and marking them as Challenged.

abilities.name: Audacious Charge
abilities.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. This Ability gains increased range against Challenged targets.

abilities.name: Crescent Guard
abilities.description: Xin Zhao passively challenges an enemy he damaged recently. When activated, Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

passive.name: Determination
passive.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

champions.name: Yasuo
champions.title: the Unforgiven
champions.blurb: An Ionian of deep resolve, Yasuo is an agile swordsman who wields the air itself against his enemies. As a proud young man, he was falsely accused of murdering his master—unable to prove his innocence, he was forced to slay his own brother in self...

abilities.name: Steel Tempest
abilities.description: Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.

abilities.name: Wind Wall
abilities.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Sweeping Blade
abilities.description: Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases subsequent dash's damage, up to a max amount.Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

abilities.name: Last Breath
abilities.description: Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.

passive.name: Way of the Wanderer
passive.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

champions.name: Yone
champions.title: the Unforgotten
champions.blurb: In life, he was Yone—half-brother of Yasuo, and renowned student of his village's sword school. But upon his death at the hands of his brother, he found himself hunted by a malevolent entity of the spirit realm, and was forced to slay it with its own...

abilities.name: Mortal Steel
abilities.description: Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne.

abilities.name: Spirit Cleave
abilities.description: Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to Yone, the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe.Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed.

abilities.name: Soul Unbound
abilities.description: Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining Move Speed. When this ability ends, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit.

abilities.name: Fate Sealed
abilities.description: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him.

passive.name: Way of the Hunter
passive.description: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.

champions.name: Yorick
champions.title: Shepherd of Souls
champions.blurb: The last survivor of a long-forgotten religious order, Yorick is both blessed and cursed with power over the dead. Trapped on the Shadow Isles, his only companions are the rotting corpses and shrieking wraiths that he gathers to him. Yorick's monstrous...

abilities.name: Last Rites
abilities.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target is a champion or large monster or if the target dies, a grave will be dug.
abilities.notes: Killing summoned ghouls does NOT give cs

abilities.name: Dark Procession
abilities.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
abilities.notes: Destroying the cage does NOT give cs

abilities.name: Mourning Mist
abilities.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that reduces armor, damages, slows and marks enemies. Summoned units gain move speed when moving towards marked targets.

abilities.name: Eulogy of the Isles
abilities.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
abilities.notes: Killing the maiden gives cs. Killing the ghouls does NOT give cs

passive.name: Shepherd of Souls
passive.description: The Cursed Horde: Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.
passive.notes: Killing the ghouls does NOT give cs

champions.name: Yunara
champions.title: the Unbroken Faith
champions.blurb: Unwavering in her devotion to Ionia, Yunara has spent centuries cloistered away in the spirit realm honing her skills with the Aion Er'na, a legendary Kinkou relic. Despite all she has sacrificed, Yunara's vow to rid the land of disharmony and strife...

abilities.name: Cultivation of Spirit
abilities.description: Yunara gains Attack Speed, bonus damage On-Hit, and her Attacks spread to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Arc of Judgment | Arc of Ruin
abilities.description: Yunara fires a spinning prayer bead that deals damage and slows enemies. While in her Transcendent State she instead fires off a laser that deals damage and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Kanmei's Steps | Untouchable Shadow
abilities.description: Yunara gains decaying movement speed and becomes Ghosted. While in her Transcendent State she instead dashes in a direction.

abilities.name: Transcend One's Self
abilities.description: Yunara enters a Transcendent State that upgrades her basic Abilities.

passive.name: Vow of the First Lands
passive.description: Yunara's Critical Strikes deal bonus magic damage.

champions.name: Yuumi
champions.title: the Magical Cat
champions.blurb: A magical cat from Bandle City, Yuumi was once the familiar of a yordle enchantress, Norra. When her master mysteriously disappeared, Yuumi became the Keeper of Norra's sentient Book of Thresholds, traveling through portals in its pages to search for...

abilities.name: Prowling Projectile
abilities.description: Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage and slowing first target hit. It deals bonus damage and an enchanced slow if it takes at least 1.35 seconds to get to its target. While on her Best Friend, the slow is always enhanced and grants bonus On-Hit damage to her ally.While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor for a brief period.

abilities.name: You and Me!
abilities.description: Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets. While on her Best Friend, she gains Heal & Shield Power and grants her Ally On-Hit healing.

abilities.name: Zoomies
abilities.description: Shields Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.

abilities.name: Final Chapter
abilities.description: Yuumi channels five waves that damage enemies and heal allies. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling. While on her Best Friend, this spell also follows her mouse.

passive.name: Feline Friendship
passive.description: Periodically, when Yuumi strikes a champion with an attack or ability, she restores health to herself and the next ally she Attaches to.While Attached, Yuumi generates a special bond with her allies. The ally with the strongest bond enhances Yuumi's abilities while she is Attached to them.

champions.name: Zac
champions.title: the Secret Weapon
champions.blurb: Zac is the product of a toxic spill that ran through a chemtech seam and pooled in an isolated cavern deep in Zaun's Sump. Despite such humble origins, Zac has grown from primordial ooze into a thinking being who dwells in the city's pipes, occasionally...

abilities.name: Stretching Strikes
abilities.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

abilities.name: Unstable Matter
abilities.description: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.

abilities.name: Elastic Slingshot
abilities.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

abilities.name: Let's Bounce!
abilities.description: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.

passive.name: Cell Division
passive.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

champions.name: Zed
champions.title: the Master of Shadows
champions.blurb: Utterly ruthless and without mercy, Zed is the leader of the Order of Shadow, an organization he created with the intent of militarizing Ionia's magical and martial traditions to drive out Noxian invaders. During the war, desperation led him to unlock...

abilities.name: Razor Shuriken
abilities.description: Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.

abilities.name: Living Shadow
abilities.description: Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

abilities.name: Shadow Slash
abilities.description: Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.description: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

passive.name: Contempt for the Weak
passive.description: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds against the same enemy champion.

champions.name: Zeri
champions.title: The Spark of Zaun
champions.blurb: A headstrong, spirited young woman from Zaun's working-class, Zeri channels her electric magic to charge herself and her custom-crafted gun. Her volatile power mirrors her emotions, its sparks reflecting her lightning-fast approach to life. Deeply...

abilities.name: Burst Fire
abilities.description: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.

abilities.name: Ultrashock Laser
abilities.description: Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser.

abilities.name: Spark Surge
abilities.description: Zeri dashes a short distance and energizes her next 3 shots of Burst Fire, causing them to pierce through enemies. She will vault and grind over any terrain she touches.

abilities.name: Lightning Crash
abilities.description: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies.

passive.name: Living Battery
passive.description: Zeri's Attacks deal magic damage and are treated as Abilities. Moving and casting Burst Fire stores up energy in Zeri's Sparkpack. When fully charged her next Attack deals bonus damage.

champions.name: Ziggs
champions.title: the Hexplosives Expert
champions.blurb: With a love of big bombs and short fuses, the yordle Ziggs is an explosive force of nature. As an inventor's assistant in Piltover, he was bored by his predictable life and befriended a mad, blue-haired bomber named Jinx. After a wild night on the town...

abilities.name: Bouncing Bomb
abilities.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

abilities.name: Satchel Charge
abilities.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after a delay, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.

abilities.name: Hexplosive Minefield
abilities.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
abilities.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.

passive.name: Short Fuse
passive.description: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

champions.name: Zilean
champions.title: the Chronokeeper
champions.blurb: Once a powerful Icathian mage, Zilean became obsessed with the passage of time after witnessing his homeland's destruction by the Void. Unable to spare even a minute to grieve the catastrophic loss, he called upon ancient temporal magic to divine all...

abilities.name: Time Bomb
abilities.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Rewind
abilities.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

abilities.name: Time Warp
abilities.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Chronoshift
abilities.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

passive.name: Time In A Bottle
passive.description: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

champions.name: Zoe
champions.title: the Aspect of Twilight
champions.blurb: As the embodiment of mischief, imagination, and change, Zoe acts as the cosmic messenger of Targon, heralding major events that reshape worlds. Her mere presence warps the arcane mathematics governing realities, sometimes causing cataclysms without...

abilities.name: Paddle Star!
abilities.description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

abilities.name: Spell Thief
abilities.description: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

abilities.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
abilities.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. While asleep, the target's Magic Resist is reduced. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

abilities.name: Portal Jump
abilities.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

passive.name: More Sparkles!
passive.description: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

champions.name: Zyra
champions.title: Rise of the Thorns
champions.blurb: Born in an ancient, sorcerous catastrophe, Zyra is the wrath of nature given form—an alluring hybrid of plant and human, kindling new life with every step. She views the many mortals of Valoran as little more than prey for her seeded progeny, and thinks...

abilities.name: Deadly Spines
abilities.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

abilities.name: Rampant Growth
abilities.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
abilities.notes: Destroying normal plants does NOT give cs

abilities.name: Grasping Roots
abilities.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed.

abilities.name: Stranglethorns
abilities.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.
abilities.notes: Destroying ultimate plants does NOT give cs

passive.name: Garden of Thorns
passive.description: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.
passive.notes: Destroying normal plants does NOT give cs
